author: cnbc.com
title: Central Garden: Fiscal 2Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
WALNUT CREEK, Calif. (AP) _ Central Garden & Pet Co. (CENT) on Monday reported fiscal second-quarter earnings of $45.2 million.
On a per-share basis, the Walnut Creek, California-based company said it had net income of 86 cents.
The maker of products for the pet supply and lawn and garden markets posted revenue of $613.1 million in the period.
Central Garden shares have dropped almost 7 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Monday, shares hit $36.34, a climb of roughly 4 percent in the last 12 months.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on CENT at https://www.zacks.com/ap/CENT
